name: Awesome Shortcodes For Genesis
author: Sanjeev Mohindra

sections.description:
This plugin will enhance the functionality of Genesis 2.5 themes and add some additional functions like adding boxes, buttons, videos, code, giveaways to your post and pages.

Features:

  1. Add different color boxes (with title and content) and buttons to your post and pages. 6 colors are available.
  2. Boxes can be expandable, with the complete animation and header (Good for creating FAQ pages.).
  3. Add responsive videos from YouTube to the post or pages. The plugin will allow you to add videos, which will work automatically on Mobile and desktop site.
  4. Insert code snippet easily from Gist.
  5. Insert giveaways easily to your post and pages. Support for Rafflecopter and Punchtab.
  6. Adds an easy way to insert columns. It supports two, three, four and six columns.

For Support Open a ticket at Support Forum.

You can request new feature here.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. Setup the plugin in the setting menu.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload the full directory into your wp-content/plugins directory
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page
  3. Setup the plugin in the setting menu.

Will it work with all the child themes of Genesis?

Yes, It should work with every child theme of Genesis. If you face any issue, just open a support ticket.
sections.changelog:
1.1.8

  • More fixes for Apple News Format and AMP support.
  • Compatability for https protocol.

1.1.7

  • More fixes for Apple News Format and AMP support.
  • Video will fallback on WordPress Video ShortCode as its much more polished now.

1.1.6

  • Some fixes related to Apple News Format support.

1.1.5

  • Added rel attribute to links in Button.
  • All external link will have noopener rel attribute.

1.1.4

  • Added Buy it from Amazon Button.
  • Some small fixes ane a new Teal Color.

1.1.3

  • Fixed the fatal error message due to clashes with some other plugins.

1.1.2

  • Fixed the display of the Box and Button shortcodes if you have selected content in the editor.

1.1.1

  • Fixed the display of the Box shortcodes added before Version 1.1 Update.

1.1

  • Complete Overhaul for the Boxes. Now you can toggle content and include titles.

1.0

  • First version.

short_description: This plugin will add shortcodes to Genesis 2.5 Themes. It adds most of the required functionality, so you can manage your themes correctly.
